amendment.description: To make available from additional appropriations for Operation and Maintenance, Army National Guard, up to $6,700,000 for the pilot program of the Army National Guard on the reintegration of members of the National Guard into civilian life after deployment.

action.text: Amendment SA 4773 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Dayton.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4773 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
